result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Isaac Daniel Pacey

records.addlTxt:
1:00 PM Defendant Isaac Daniel Pacey appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Isaac Daniel Pacey.  Attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Atty Hansen heard on motion for bond modification.
DA heard and objects any modification to bond.
Atty Hansen argues.
Court heard and denies any modification to bond.
All bond and conditions to remain in place as previously ordered.
1:07 PM

Defendant Isaac Daniel Pacey appeared by Zoom video, in custody at MCJ.  Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Isaac Daniel Pacey.  Prosecuting attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
3:17 p.m.
Copy of Information.
Waives reading.
Enters not guilty pleas.
Requests STC.
3:18 p.m.
Status conference scheduled for November 21, 2022 at 03:50 pm.
Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing and Order to Bind Over

Defendant Isaac Daniel Pacey appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Isaac Daniel Pacey.  Attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin. 
3:08 p.m.
Prelim Questionnaire/Waiver filed.
Court finds Deft freely waives prelim.
Deft bound over for trial.
Arraignment already scheduled. 
3:11 p.m.

9:01 AM Defendant Isaac Daniel Pacey appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Isaac Daniel Pacey. 
Court calls case.
Copy of complaint.
Atty Hansen heard - has reviewed with deft.
Deft understands charges and penalties.
Waives formal reading.
Request prelim within time limits.
Court schedules with parties.
Atty Hanses requests ARGN be scheduled a day early for his schedule.
9:03 AM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 25, 2022 at 03:15 pm.
Arraignment scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Inmate correspondence- Request for Bail/bond reduction

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
11:36 AM Defendant Isaac Daniel Pacey appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Copy of Criminal Complaint.
Court reviews charges and maximum penalties.
DA heard on bond recommendations.
Deft heard.
Court inquires on atty.
Court imposes $10,000 cash bail w/ conditions; sign waiver of extradition, no possession or consumption of alcohol or controlled substances illegal in WI today w/o a valid Rx.
Deft to contact the Public Defender's office today.
11:43 AM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.
